headline: Intuit’s All-in-One Platform Introduces a Virtual Team of AI Agents to Help Canadian Businesses Increase Efficiency and Growth
summary: TORONTO, November 14, 2025--A more powerful QuickBooks on the Intuit platform combines AI agents and trusted experts to unlock time savings and insights for Canadian customers.

headline: Intuit and Cherry Bekaert partner to offer ERP platform
summary: Cherry Bekaert will use the partnership to transition its existing clients currently using QuickBooks and introduce new businesses to Intuit’s suite of tools.

raw.headline: Intuit and Cherry Bekaert partner to offer ERP platform
raw.summary: Cherry Bekaert will use the partnership to transition its existing clients currently using QuickBooks and introduce new businesses to Intuit’s suite of tools.

headline: How Recent Shifts Are Rewriting the Story for Intuit
summary: The consensus price target for Intuit shares has slipped modestly, falling from $819.73 to $807.12 following recent analyst updates. This shift reflects mixed sentiment in the wake of new guidance and evolving business conditions. Stay tuned to see how you can keep pace with future adjustments in Intuit's story as market opinions continue to evolve. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Intuit shifts by adding it to your watchlist or portfolio. Alternatively, explore our Community to discover...

headline: Intuit’s All-in-One Platform Introduces a Virtual Team of AI Agents to Help UK Businesses Increase Efficiency and Growth
summary: LONDON, November 14, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, has today announced the global availability of AI agents on Intuit’s All-in-One platform, creating a more powerful and automated QuickBooks experience designed to deliver time savings, greater efficiency, insights and value for customers.
